text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: I see you were talking to your support horsegirls!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Every single encounter is a precious experience. Please make the most of them when training your horsegirls!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: … Incidentally, this academy is very extensive. It's not unlikely you could run into horsegirls not part of your support group～
